import api from'./api';import{mockBankService}from'./mock.service';// Use o mock em ambiente de desenvolvimento ou se não houver API configurada
const useMock=true;export const bankService=useMock?mockBankService:{async getBanks(){const response=await api.get('/banks');return response.data;},async getBankById(id){const response=await api.get("/banks/".concat(id));return response.data;},async getBankProducts(bankId){const response=await api.get("/banks/".concat(bankId,"/products"));return response.data;}};
